name: deep-thoughts
description: - UCLAx-U2 project # 21 - The MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js) to build a social media application called Deep Thoughts.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Nikita 'Nik' Sharpio aka niksharpkings
